channel.title: Spawning Help
channel.description:
[b]How Do i Make My Server Become Spawnable for every1?[/b]
[glow=red,2,300]Help me[/glow]

item.title: Spawning Help
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

go to client.java and search for the commands to spawn…,

this is a example of a item

else if (command.startsWith("redphat") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1038,1);

just delete the && playerRights >= 2)
and all ppl can spawn a red phat (is example to help you)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 30, 2006, 11:51:34 AM[/size][hr]this is what i think about noobs…,
they stupid

i say a answer and they dont say thx or whatever bback just use it and ignore me…, if they have questions only talk to me…, noob

Read full topic
